content.raw:
So far, what I have found is that the docker compose script works as is (without this PR) on two conditions:

  * You have recently ran `run.bash` and it has created `/tmp/.docker.xauth` or
  *  You have a user on the host that has the same id as the user in the container and that user has permission to access the X11 server. Running `xhost` will show which users have permission.
content.html:
So far, what I have found is that the docker compose script works as is (without this PR) on two conditions:

  • You have recently ran run.bash and it has created /tmp/.docker.xauth or
  • You have a user on the host that has the same id as the user in the container and that user has permission to access the X11 server. Running xhost will show which users have permission.
